text: Dobrich Province is a province in northeastern Bulgaria. The capital city is also named Dobrich. ==Municipalities== The Dobrich province has eight municipalities. The following table shows the names of each municipality, the main town (in bold) or village, and the population of each in December 2009. Municipality Pop. Town/Village Pop. Bulgarian National Statistical Institute - Bulgarian towns in 2009 Balchik 21,832 Balchik 12,196 Dobrich (city) 92,672 Dobrich 92,672 Dobrichka (rural) 24,292 Dobrich (above) General Toshevo 16,714 General Toshevo 7,130 Kavarna 15,861 Kavarna 11,397 Krushari 5,296 Krushari 1,619 Shabla 5,580 Shabla 3,586 Tervel 17,458 Tervel 6,667 ==References== Category:Provinces of Bulgaria
title: Dobrich Province
